doc.field: An historical map & plan of the campaign in Belgium A.D. 1815 : exhibiting the cantonments, encampments, positions, bivouacs, advance, retrograde movements, retreat, flight &c. of the forces of France, England, and Prussia, with the attacks of the 15th, battles of Ligny and Quatre Bras on the 16th, and of the battle of Waterloo gained over the French by the English & Prussians on Sunday the 18th of June

An historical map & plan of the campaign in Belgium A.D. 1815 : exhibiting the cantonments, encampments, positions, bivouacs, advance, retrograde movements, retreat, flight &c. of the forces of France, England, and Prussia, with the attacks of the 15th, battles of Ligny and Quatre Bras on the 16th, and of the battle of Waterloo gained over the French by the English & Prussians on Sunday the 18th of June
